item.title: Education
item.description: Someone can always take away your money or belongings from you, but no one can ever steal your education.

item.title: Problem of evil
item.description: There are two solutions to the problem of evil - take away the freewill or deliver instant justice. Neither of these solutions are attractive. So God came up with another one, mercy and grace through Jesus Christ. Unfortunately some reject this too.

item.title: Some are yet to evolve
item.description: If you are a product of evolution then you should also not hold accountable those who commit animalistic crime because they have not yet fully evolved.

item.title: Absolute truth
item.description: Some say - “There is no absolute truth” ok, so how about what you just said?

item.title: Teaching through suffering
item.description: Many people say - “God is trying to teach me something by this sickness”. If it is so then why not focus all your energy into finding out and learning quickly what it is that God is trying to teach you, rather than wasting your time, resources and energy in doctors and medical treatment.

item.title: Sovereign King
item.description: In the service there was great music, great ambience, really good people, love overflowing, but heard about a Sovereign King who plagues his subjects with sickness and misery for greater good that no one understands.

item.title: How people come to Christ
item.description: The only way people come to Christ is by hearing the Gospel of the Lord Jesus Christ.

item.title: We are born sinners
item.description: Human beings are born sinners, only way to be righteous is to be born again in Christ Jesus.

item.title: Traditions of men
item.description: Traditions of men make The Word of God of null effect.

item.title: Analyze news in the light of the Word of God
item.description: Do not analyze Word of God in the light of news but analyze news in the light of the Word of God.

item.title: When vilest men are exalted
item.description: The wicked walk on every side, when the vilest men are exalted. (Psalm 12:8)

item.title: Faith comes by hearing
item.description: Faith comes by hearing, yes hearing, yes once again hearing, and hearing the Word of God(Romans 10:17).

item.title: Prince of Peace
item.description: Everyone wants peace, but they do not want to come to Jesus - The Prince of Peace.

item.title: Bible - The Word of God
item.description: Bible - The Word of God, is the only book that teaches all things pertaining to life.
